title: Dry Reforming of HCs (Methane, Ethane, and Propane) over a 40Ni0.75(Ce1-xFex)0.25/Al2O3 Catalyst: A comparative study
content:
Sustainable Energy Fuels, 2024, Accepted Manuscript
DOI: 10.1039/D4SE00467A, Paper
Akanksha Singh Rajput, Taraknath Das
The dry reforming of methane, ethane, and propane to synthesis gas using the same catalyst is very limited reported in the open literature. The present study was basically a comparative...
